name: process_queue_kafkajs
description: Watch queue for updates to movie reviews which need to be merged with other metadata

scripts.clean: docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml stop review-updates-api-nodejs-kafkajs-kafka kafka zoo && rm -rf ../storage/kafka ../storage/zookeeper
scripts.start:docker: docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --env-file=../.env up --remove-orphans --build -d review-updates-api-nodejs-kafkajs-kafka && docker-compose logs -f review-updates-api-nodejs-kafkajs-kafka
